titles.title: No Firearms for Foreign Felons Act of 2011
A bill to establish and clarify that Congress does not authorize persons convicted of dangerous crimes in foreign courts to freely possess firearms in the United States.
No Firearms for Foreign Felons Act of 2011

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: No Firearms for Foreign Felons Act of 2011 - Amends the federal criminal code to prevent any individual convicted of a felony or crime of domestic violence in a foreign court from possessing a firearm in the United States.
